page.syntax: Result_Flag as L = ReadLine(Data BYREF as C[, Timeout as N = -1])

argument.name: Result_Flag
argument.description: TRUE (.T.) if the operation was successful; otherwise FALSE (.F.).

argument.name: Data
argument.description: The data received from the connection.

argument.name: Timeout
argument.description: The time (in milliseconds) to wait for a complete line of data to be received.

page.description: Reads a line from the receive buffer. A line is terminated by a carriage-return and a line feed. If nothing is available, an empty string is returned.
page.discussion: The INET::Socket::ReadLine() method reads a line from the receive buffer. A line is terminated by a carriage-return and a line feed. If nothing is available, the method returns an empty string.
